mapper.select: select e.id id, e.name name, e.mailid mailid, e.start_date start_date, e.manager_id manager_id, e.title title, e.dept_id dept_id, d.name dept_name, ifnull(e.salary,0.0) salary, ifnull(e.commission_pct,0.0) commission_pct from s_emp e join s_dept d on e.dept_id=d.dept_id order by e.id
